name: Car Mayhem
description:
Car Mayhem

2D game, played on Top View.

Your goal is basically dodge the cars coming onto you, and more importantly entertain the crowd. The more you progress, the more attention you get by people!

Collect coins throughout the match spawned randomly on the playground.

With the score you achieved, you can upgrade essential Wealth and Toughness upgrades on Shop.

Feel free to leave any feedback down in the comments.
